name: Crumb
description: Crumb, also known as 'Ground Soda', the most basic and common material. This is mainly used for building tough structures or walls, can also be used as ammunition.
details: Because of its density, it is mainly used for building structures basic structures, but this also makes it a bit dangerous for if it goes under enough pressure, it will just explode, and by using this effect, it can also be used as ammunition.
